title: Electric Sweeper Truck DTMS – 5000 EV
description: The Dynaclean DTMS-5000 Electric Sweeper Truck is capable of seamlessly integrating into smart city operations. The machine is environmentally innovative, designed for optimal performance when cleaning urban areas or industry settings.Being a battery-powered street sweeper, it does not emit harmful gases. This feature makes the device highly suitable for use in places such as industrial parks, airports, and cities where environmental concerns are a primary focus.
keyFeatures: Anti-Smog Water Spray System – Controls dust and improves air quality during sweeping.
In-Built Jet Pressure Washer (150 Bar) – Multi-purpose use for deep cleaning roads, sidewalks, and public spaces.
Plant Washing System – Cleans roadside plants and keeps the environment green.
High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – 1500L water and 6000L dust collection for extended operation.
Spacious & Comfortable Cabin – Accommodates two operators for efficient cleaning management.
Zero Emissions & Eco-Friendly – Reduces air pollution with a fully electric operation.
Ergonomic & User-Friendly Design – Easy-to-use controls for effortless operation.
Large Sweeping Width (3400 mm) – Ensures faster and more effective cleaning in less time.
